items.name: The Game Reviews Wiki
items.title: The Game Reviews Wiki
items.headline: Wanna talk about your favorite games?  Then this is the wiki for you.
items.desc:
The Game Reviews Wiki isn't your average biased, agenda-based game review site.  It's just a place you can come to where you can talk to others who love video games and give your opinions on games you love, hate, or find just plain average.  No pressure, no fuss, no limitations.

Anyone is welcome to check out the wiki, write as many reviews as they want, or read as many as they want.  We all hope that you enjoy our work, and that you bring something away from it!
